author: vmassol
msg: another new todo before releasing cactus 1.3

author: vmassol
msg: * Added support for per test case redirector (see changes.html)
* Added support for BASIC authentication (see changes.html) - Thanks to Jason Robertson and Peter Wong !

author: vmassol
msg: log the content of the error stream when an error code is returned by the server side

author: vmassol
msg: added delaySocketClose="true", which is a new attribute of Tomcat 3.3.1. The reason is that on fast CPU Tomcat 3.3.0 is releasing too quickly opened sockets and the Cactus client side gets a "socket closed by peer" exception
